bundle_id_mismatch.error: No matching profiles found for bundle identifier
bundle_id_mismatch.solution: Create app in App Store Connect with exact bundle ID from YAML

team_id_issues.error: Invalid team ID or missing provisioning

missing_capabilities.solution: Enable in App Store Connect app settings

required.name: APP_STORE_CONNECT_ISSUER_ID
required.description: Your Apple Developer Team ID / Issuer ID
required.location: App Store Connect → Users & Access → Keys
